arts.ttl: Liverpool transfer now virtually guaranteed as suitors expected for substitute
arts.sum: Ian Doyle looks at the talking points as Liverpool move within three points of the Premier League title after victory at Leicester City on Sunday

arts.ttl: Trent Alexander-Arnold contract latest as Arne Slot addresses Liverpool right-back's future after Leicester City win
arts.sum: Liverpool boss Arne Slot addresses question marks about Trent Alexander-Arnold's future following the side's 1-0 Premier League victory against Leicester City on Sunday.

arts.ttl: A win away from the title, Liverpool coronation begins at Leicester
arts.sum: Liverpool's fans were already celebrating the title in the win at Leicester. The team itself will soon join in.

arts.ttl: Ruud van Nistelrooy admits he is still in the dark over his Leicester future but insists he has no regrets despite Foxes' relegation after Liverpool defeat
arts.sum: Van Nistelrooy stressed his disappointment after Leicester City were relegated back to the Championship but admitted that he is still in the dark over his own future at the club.

arts.ttl: 'A club at a crossroads' - relegated Leicester in need of rebuild
arts.sum: The banner flown over the King Power Stadium made its point before a second relegation in three seasons, and instant return to the Championship, was confirmed soon afterwards for Leicester City.

arts.ttl: Roy Keane flags Leicester City problems as he champions old Man United team-mate as manager
arts.sum: Roy Keane says there are problems at Leicester City - but believes Ruud van Nistelrooy is the man to manage the club next season. “He obviously wants backing from the board and to get on with the recruitment, the pre-season and to start looking at plans ahead.

arts.ttl: Trent Alexander-Arnold’s heroics at Leicester provide crowning glory for champions-elect Liverpool
arts.sum: Leicester 0-1 Liverpool: Trent Alexander-Arnold fires Arne Slot’s Reds to within one win of the Premier League title

arts.ttl: Liverpool rumours: Arne Slot interested in signing Leicester City wonderkid as potential Mohamed Salah heir
arts.sum: Liverpool will reportedly consider making a move for a Leicester City wonderkid, with the Reds keen to prepare for a future without Mohamed Salah.

arts.ttl: Van Nistelrooy wants 'conversations about next season' after Foxes relegated
arts.sum: Leicester boss Ruud van Nistelrooy says he wants to have conversations with the club about next season after the Foxes were relegated from the Premier League after a 1-0 defeat against Liverpool at the King Power stadium.

arts.ttl: Trent Alexander-Arnold Asked About Liverpool Future Moments After Leicester City Win
arts.sum: Liverpool's Trent Alexander-Arnold has raised eyebrows with his comments when quizzed over his Anfield future.
